section.title:
subaccounts
types for
subaccount types
master list of Subaccount Types
section.para: Subaccount types may be used to assign additional detail to an account number's account type. An account type may have multiple subaccount types. For example, the account type Asset may have the following subaccount types: cash, inventory, accounts receivable, etc. To access the master list of subaccount types, go to Accounting > Ledger Accounts > Subaccount Types. The following screen will appear:
The Subaccount Types screen displays information on all existing subaccount types, including subaccount code, account type, and subaccount description.
